job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you on the look to create real impact in the world of AI? Exciting developments are happening, offering opportunities for businesses to innovate and gain a competitive edge. Now is the time to join us and leverage those data skills to a next level while working on the most innovative projects for the biggest clients across Europe such as Randstad, ASML, FUNKE, and many more! Whether it's about leveraging LLMs to improve customer support, building data lakes on cloud platforms to improve storage or implementing sensors for quality control. You can find it all at ML6.

   As an AI Engineer, you'll contribute to this by building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure using a dynamic and cutting-edge tech stack.

   Within your team you will:
     * Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
     * Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture
     * Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
     * Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
     * Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
     * Work with a wide range of technologies, such as:
       GCP, Azure or/and AWS, Python, Kubernetes, Dataflow / Apache Beam, Terraform, Flask / Connexion, BigQuery, DBT, Kubeflow Pipelines...
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

Are you on the look to create real impact in the world of AI? Exciting developments are happening, offering opportunities for businesses to innovate and gain a competitive edge. Now is the time to join us and leverage those data skills to a next level while working on the most innovative projects for the biggest clients across Europe such as Randstad, ASML, FUNKE, and many more! Whether it's about leveraging LLMs to improve customer support, building data lakes on cloud platforms to improve storage or implementing sensors for quality control. You can find it all at ML6.

   As an AI Engineer, you'll contribute to this by building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure using a dynamic and cutting-edge tech stack.

   Within your team you will:
     * Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
     * Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture
     * Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
     * Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
     * Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
     * Work with a wide range of technologies, such as:
       GCP, Azure or/and AWS, Python, Kubernetes, Dataflow / Apache Beam, Terraform, Flask / Connexion, BigQuery, DBT, Kubeflow Pipelines...

profile_classification.rationale: The job description mentions building data pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and deploying applications, which could align with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. However, it lacks specific details about the core tasks of model development, fine-tuning, or advanced prompt engineering that would clearly define it as either. The emphasis on consulting and translating business needs, along with a broad range of technologies without deep dives into AI-specific ones, makes it lean towards a more general or ambiguous role, potentially focused on the application of AI rather than core AI development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions' directly reflects the ability to understand business context and requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders' highlights the need to bridge business and technical understanding and communicate effectively.
job_tasks.phrase: efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Be a true consultant' implies understanding client needs and providing solutions, which is a business-oriented task.
The phrase 'building scalable data pipelines' directly relates to the creation and maintenance of data infrastructure.
The phrase 'Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture' involves the foundational aspects of data infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines' describes the core activities of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud' indicates the development and deployment of software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Flask / Connexion' are web framework technologies used for building applications and APIs.
The phrase 'cloud infrastructure' and the mention of deployment tools like Kubernetes and Kubeflow Pipelines suggest operational aspects of managing systems.
The phrase 'Kubernetes' is a container orchestration system used for deploying and managing applications, a key MLOps tool.
The phrase 'Kubeflow Pipelines' is a platform for building and deploying portable, scalable machine learning workflows, directly related to MLOps.
The phrase 'Dataflow / Apache Beam' are technologies for building data processing pipelines, often used in MLOps contexts for batch and stream processing.
